mapper.select: select t1.id goodsId,t1.name goodsName,t1.type_id typeId,t1.shop_id shopId,t1.price,t1.head_img headImg ,date_format(t.join_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') joinTime from shopping_car t inner join goods t1 on (t.goods_id=t1.id) where t.user_id=#{userId} order by joinTime desc
mapper.update: update shopping_car set amount=#{amount} where user_id=#{userId} and goods_id=#{goodsId}
mapper.delete:
delete from shopping_car where user_id=#{userId}
and goods_id=#{goodsId}
